Name: Knife Flipping
About the game: Become the new king of knife throwing in Knife Flipping! In Knife Flipping your goal will be to make a maximum of flip with your knife to make the biggest combo possible and thus beat your own record! Features: ■ 3 different levels! ■ 30 different knives and swords! ■ Addictive gameplay! ■ Beautiful 2D and 3D decorations!
